title: The Man in the Wall

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stalk two target players during the day, marking them for collapse.
- Collapse a marked player's house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you collapse a player's house, everyone targeting them will have their ability fail.
- If the target player targets someone who saw their collapsed house, that visit will still go through.
- You can collapse houses while dead. You may not mark while dead.
- If a marked target is attacked by a Rampage attack, you will be attacked too, unless you collapsed their house that night.
- You cannot prevent delayed abilities if they activated a night before: a poisoned player will still die if their house is destroyed.
- You cannot stalk yourself.
- You ignore prevention immunity.

desc:
Post 222
*Forever-watching, eternally unmoving, you watch from within the walls, so that your inevitable destructions may protect this time around.*
Control Immune
Redirect Immune
